resources.string: Test your reflexes.\nWait until you see the green color and then click on the screen.
Every level some cards will flash white.\nMemorize them and pick them again.\nYou have three lives.
Every level cards with number will appear.\nMemorize them and pick them in order.

Two cards with some sequence of elements will appear.With a sign:
+ : means the union (the common elements and non-common elements)).
- : means the non-common elements.
